hero.headline: Sysadmin | Hobbyist Developer | Catgirl
hero.name: May Meow
hero.summary: Versatile IT specialist with over 13 years of experience in system administration, network management, automation, and full-stack web development. I build and maintain reliable IT infrastructures for small and medium businesses, create internal tools, and work on open-source and hobby projects under the MayMeow identity. Passionate about clean architecture, security, automation, and beautifully structured web content.
